Text: O̩ma-mi, iche̩wñ kʼe̩ gbo̩wo̩ ekeji-we̩,
mak o̩la alu-we̩ le̩ mud oku fʼe̩ mu me̩,
e̩wñ kʼe̩ che faifai o̩ma-mi kʼe̩ gbʼo̩la-we̩ tane̩ le̩ de̩,
E̩ ki fʼolu chʼeju n
e̩ ki gbʼo̩la-we̩ tane̩ alu kʼegbi agbʼo̩la-wñ tane̩ bʼo̩wo̩ ajo̩de̩ te̩,
Nyʼugbo ame̩wñ egini ki jʼane̩,
Ma la nʼe̩no̩hiala
ma muda kʼuje̩wñ jo̩ ñw o̩la-ma o̩lo̩ji,
Gbogbo nyʼe̩gba oñ uwe̩ adachi kade, uwe̩ e̩nejudoo̩?
Olu ele̩ re, olu oji ele̩ pe̩,
abe̩le̩ ale-we̩ awa bʼe̩ ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼadinya,
E̩ne̩be̩te̩, e̩ne̩belial,
kʼi abʼone̩ eju, kʼi anʼe̩re̩-wñ ako̩la,
ayechi dʼef e̩do̩-wñ, i nʼibe e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ añwa e̩gba du,
todule̩ uchobi-wñ awa bʼo ma achi-gili;
E̩wñ me̩fa do̩mo̩ ki chʼe̩wñ ulaka Jihofa,
oñ che eju ki ake kpai ukpalu ki arʼolemi,
e̩do̩ ki añwa e̩wñ ibe̩te̩ kʼi ache,
e̩nibenu olemi kʼolemi akpodudu dufu alu-wñ,
O̩ma-mi, fʼuko kʼata-we̩ te̩ de,
Mʼu ko ji mʼe̩do̩-we̩ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩;
Egba kʼe̩ tale i añʼe̩ ona;
Todu uko̩ ku ma te̩ le̩ chʼagege
kʼi ade uwe̩ bʼonobule̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ te̩,
E̩ño̩ alifia-wñ ki dʼef e̩do̩-we̩ n,
todu ajo̩ko̩ agbʼone̩ e̩wñ je̩ kʼuje̩wñ-wñ abo̩ re,
One̩ neke gbʼuna mʼe̩do̩ kʼukpo-wñ ma ajo̩ n?
Abe̩k one̩ neke lule̩ oji e̩ge̩ una
Abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ ki anyʼejefu ugbo o̩ya ekeji-wñ de̩;
Amone̩ ache̩de̩te̩ ajoji kʼi ji tod ebi kʼi akpʼo̩ n;
ma muda fʼowñ li i adʼakoji e̩wñ le̩ wa onu mebie;
E̩ne̩ ki bʼoya e̩ne̩ omune̩ dachi nʼibe n;
Agbe kpai achukata oñ i ane̩,
Todu ogu eja chʼe̩do̩fulu one̩,
E̩wñ akoji du awʼowñ eju n,
